description:
Time for a new chain? This reliable option is compatible with 9-speed drivetrains.

  • Compatible with SRAM, Shimano and Campagnolo 9-speed drivetrains
  • High pin power for a reliable chain that won't snap
  • Includes a reusable KMC Missing Link 9 for easy installation and removal
  • Inner chamfering for smoother shifting in 1x drivetrains
  • Width: 6.6mm
name: KMC Z9 9 Speed Chain
